ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

PermissibleValues.value: A single bone marrow sample showing greater than or equal to one percent leukemic blast by flow cytometry

ValueMeaning.preferredName: A single bone marrow sample showing greater than or equal to one percent leukemic blast by flow cytometry
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not accompanied by another or others; exclusive of anyone or anything else._A biological sample containing components collected from bone marrow of an experimental subject._Include or hold; have within or as a component._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways._The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object._A unit for expressing a number as a fraction of hundred (on the basis of a rate or proportion per hundred)._The determination of the number of leukemic blasts present in a sample._Examination and interpretation; the process of identifying an issue to be understood and addressed, modelling the issue, investigating the model results, interpreting the results, and possibly making a recommendation. The concept also refers to the examination and study of a whole in terms of the parts composing it._A technique for counting, examining and sorting microscopic particles suspended in a stream of fluid.

Concepts.definition: Not accompanied by another or others; exclusive of anyone or anything else.
A biological sample containing components collected from bone marrow of an experimental subject.
Include or hold; have within or as a component.

A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.
The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.
A unit for expressing a number as a fraction of hundred (on the basis of a rate or proportion per hundred).
The determination of the number of leukemic blasts present in a sample.

Examination and interpretation; the process of identifying an issue to be understood and addressed, modelling the issue, investigating the model results, interpreting the results, and possibly making a recommendation. The concept also refers to the examination and study of a whole in terms of the parts composing it.
A technique for counting, examining and sorting microscopic particles suspended in a stream of fluid.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.6.15 Modified PV meaning from 5 to 1. ak

PermissibleValues.value: A single marrow with at lease two tests showing greater than or equal to one percent leukemic blasts

ValueMeaning.preferredName: A single marrow with at least two tests showing greater than or equal to one percent leukemic blasts
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not accompanied by another or others; exclusive of anyone or anything else._A biological sample containing components collected from bone marrow of an experimental subject._Used to indicate the presence of something or someone._The smallest possible quantity._A natural number greater than 1 and less than 3 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of one and one._The outcome of a laboratory test._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways._The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object._A unit for expressing a number as a fraction of hundred (on the basis of a rate or proportion per hundred)._The determination of the number of leukemic blasts present in a sample.

Concepts.definition: Not accompanied by another or others; exclusive of anyone or anything else.
A biological sample containing components collected from bone marrow of an experimental subject.
Used to indicate the presence of something or someone.
The smallest possible quantity.
A natural number greater than 1 and less than 3 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of one and one.
The outcome of a laboratory test.

A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.
The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.
A unit for expressing a number as a fraction of hundred (on the basis of a rate or proportion per hundred).
The determination of the number of leukemic blasts present in a sample.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not accompanied by another or others; exclusive of anyone or anything else._A biological sample containing components collected from bone marrow of an experimental subject._Include or hold; have within or as a component._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways._A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one._A unit for expressing a number as a fraction of hundred (on the basis of a rate or proportion per hundred)._The determination of the number of leukemic blasts present in a sample._Examination and interpretation; the process of identifying an issue to be understood and addressed, modelling the issue, investigating the model results, interpreting the results, and possibly making a recommendation. The concept also refers to the examination and study of a whole in terms of the parts composing it._A technique for counting, examining and sorting microscopic particles suspended in a stream of fluid.

Concepts.definition: Not accompanied by another or others; exclusive of anyone or anything else.
A biological sample containing components collected from bone marrow of an experimental subject.
Include or hold; have within or as a component.

A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.
A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one.
A unit for expressing a number as a fraction of hundred (on the basis of a rate or proportion per hundred).
The determination of the number of leukemic blasts present in a sample.

Examination and interpretation; the process of identifying an issue to be understood and addressed, modelling the issue, investigating the model results, interpreting the results, and possibly making a recommendation. The concept also refers to the examination and study of a whole in terms of the parts composing it.
A technique for counting, examining and sorting microscopic particles suspended in a stream of fluid.
